attributes.additional_details:
Child porn sites should be banned, blocked and the people behind them, arrested and charged for there crimes.
The part of the net like piratebay,se, how ever you try make ISPs block these sites, there will always be a ways to access.
Internet censorship has gone too far, and government should be concentrating on real crimes (child porn for example) not letting media groups go to court and block access to sites.
The BPI does not control the internet nor any other group. The government needs to stop this before it becomes a massive issue.
